solution_line_template: The age of Jeremy three years from now will be {jeremy_current_age}+{years_from_now} = <<{jeremy_current_age}+{years_from_now}={jeremy_age_in_three_years}>>{jeremy_age_in_three_years} years
Since Sebastian age is four years more than Jeremy's, Sebastian is currently {jeremy_current_age}+{sebastian_age_difference} = {sebastian_current_age} years.
In three years, Sebastian will be {sebastian_current_age}+{years_from_now} = <<{sebastian_current_age}+{years_from_now}={sebastian_age_in_three_years}>>{sebastian_age_in_three_years} years old

The total age of Jeremy and Sebastian in three years will be {sebastian_age_in_three_years}+{jeremy_age_in_three_years} = <<{sebastian_age_in_three_years}+{jeremy_age_in_three_years}={jeremy_sebastian_total_age_in_three_years}>>{jeremy_sebastian_total_age_in_three_years}

If the total age of Jeremy, Sebastian and Sophia in three years is {total_age_all_three_in_three_years}, then Sophia's age in three years will be {total_age_all_three_in_three_years}-{jeremy_sebastian_total_age_in_three_years} = <<{total_age_all_three_in_three_years}-{jeremy_sebastian_total_age_in_three_years}={sophia_age_in_three_years}>>{sophia_age_in_three_years}
